observation: I can see a country/region selection page with a dropdown that shows 'Select' and a language overlay is open on the right side. There's also a 'Next' button that appears to be the main action button. I need to first close the language overlay, then select a country from the dropdown.
reasoning: As a normal user, I should first close the language overlay that's blocking the interface, then proceed to select my country/region from the dropdown to continue the signup flow.
ux_issues: Language overlay keeps appearing and blocking the signup flow
The overlay doesn't have clear indication of how to dismiss it

outcome.visual_observation: The language overlay with EN and other language options disappeared from the top-right corner. The main sign-up form remains visible with the residence selection dropdown, Next button, and login link intact. The left side content changed from cryptocurrency trading coins to a mobile app display showing payment methods (STICPAY, Skrill) and 'Fast deposits, quick withdrawals' messaging.

console_logs: [warning] The resource https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/inter/v19/UcCo3FwrK3iLTcviYwYZ8UA3.woff2 was preloaded using link preload but not used within a few seconds from the window's load event. Please make sure it has an appropriate `as` value and it is preloaded intentionally.
